description:
COURSE LAST REVIEW: JANUARY 2016

JOIN 700 STUDENTS IN MY LIBREOFFICE COURSES!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

LibreOffice is a powerful free suite, learn how to use it at best to make your documents look good and support modern open document formats.

Learn all you need to know to use LibreOffice to full advantage!You are going to see the different components of LibreOffice and a series of how-to guides.

Writer, the word-processor.

From writing a quick, simple letter (but professionally looking) to a full book. Format characters, paragraphs, sections. Work with images and frames. Learn how styles and templates can make you more productive and achieve better results in lesser time. Customize LibreOffice to your liking and learn tools and extensions available that will make your life easier.

You will get:

  • Full, free lifetime access
  • All future extra lectures and upgrades are always included for free
  • Unconditional Udemy 30 day money-back guarantee - that's my personal promise of your success!

I am adding lectures and the price will soon go up to $35 so get in now at the reduced price (future lectures will be available for free for enrolled customers).
title: Learn LibreOffice now, start using the FREE suite: Writer
